H0.text: Give a year in the life of abstract painter Wassily Kandinsky.. 1880

H3.text: Give a year in the life of abstract painter Wassily Kandinsky.. 1866-1944

A4.text: Wassily Wassilyevich Kandinsky (16 December [O.S. 4 December] 1866 – 13 December 1944) was a Russian painter and art theorist active in Germany during the late Belle Époque and Interwar eras.
